description1: The <a> tag defines a hyperlink. The href attribute specifies the URL of the page the link goes to:
description2: The tag is used to embed an image in an HTML page. The src attribute specifies the path to the image to be displayed:
description3: The tag should also contain the width and height attributes, which specifies the width and height of the image (in pixels):
description4: The required alt attribute for the tag specifies an alternate text for an image, if the image for some reason cannot be displayed. This can be due to slow connection, or an error in the src attribute, or if the user uses a screen reader.
description5: The style attribute is used to add styles to an element, such as color, font, size, and more.
exampleTitle3: Example: The width and height Attributes
